0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9510 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "CREDIT INFORMATION SYSTEM ACT", TO FOSTER A MORE EFFICIENT CREDIT INFORMATION SYSTEM THAT WILL ENABLE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS TO REDUCE THEIR OVER-ALL CREDIT RISK, TO CONTRIBUTE TO A HEALTHIER AND MORE STABLE FINANCIAL SYSTEM, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05821
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9510 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "CREDIT INFORMATION SYSTEM ACT", TO FOSTER A MORE EFFICIENT CREDIT INFORMATION SYSTEM THAT WILL ENABLE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS TO REDUCE THEIR OVER-ALL CREDIT RISK, TO CONTRIBUTE TO A HEALTHIER AND MORE STABLE FINANCIAL SYSTEM, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
